column5: In the same boat as of yesterday. For me it comes in intense waves of worthlessness and regret and self hate. It's when I try to keep the mask on too long. Failure is always the harbinger of greatness in nearly every case even those that end in death. One cannot be great without having had hardship. Greatness is within you and all of us even when I or you don't believe it can possibly be. I've written so many posts that people find inspiring on my numerous other accounts across the internet and I scoff at the dewy eyed hero to be within because it's ridiculous ... And yet it's there. Even I don't believe these words to be true and yet when I'm stripped bare, they're the onlt words that make sense.
